thing.title: Corner/shelf bracket, 3-screw
thing.author: vik
thing.description: This a little corner bracket for putting on internal faces. Ideal for light-duty shelving and generally fixing two sheets of wood or MDF in a T-shape. It is a compact design which tucks right in the corner. Fits with 3 x 3mm diameter countersunk wood screws. Use at least 2 per side.Not suitable for non-countersunk fasteners.
